title: How to See Hidden Friends or the Hidden Folder on Snapchat

steps.title: Go to the Chat page.
steps.content: Go to the Chat page. Tap the chat button in the bottom left of Snapchat to open the Chat page. If a friend you want to talk to seems to be hidden and isn’t appearing on the Chat page, you’ll need to search for them manually. Friends can be manually unadded from the Chat page using the clear conversations feature in Snapchat.

steps.title: Tap the search button.
steps.content: Tap the search button. It’s the magnifying glass icon in the top left, next to the profile button.

steps.title: Search for the hidden friend.
steps.content: Search for the hidden friend. Type their name or username into the search box. If they don’t appear in your friends list, they may have deleted their Snapchat account.

steps.title: Tap the profile button.
steps.content: Tap the profile button. It’s the icon of your Snapchat avatar in the top left of the app. This method will check your list of blocked users to look for hidden friends.

steps.title: Tap the settings button.
steps.content: Tap the settings button. This is the gear icon in the top right of the profile page. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Blocked.
steps.content: Tap Blocked . It’s located in the “Account Actions” section of the settings page. This will open the list of users you have blocked on Snapchat . [2] X Research source You can unblock Snapchat users from this list by taping the X button next to their name. [3] X Research source For more tips on blocking and general safety, check out our guide on how to stay safe on Snapchat .

steps.title: Tap the Memories button.
steps.content: Tap the Memories button. It’s the icon with two rectangles on the camera screen. This is where you can access My Eyes Only, a hidden password-protected folder on Snapchat for keeping photos and videos separate from the general Snaps folder. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Tap My Eyes Only.
steps.content: Tap My Eyes Only . It’s a tab at the top of the Memories page. You may have to scroll the tabs bar to see it. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Enter the pin number.
steps.content: Enter the pin number. If you’ve already established a pin number for My Eyes Only, enter it now. If you haven’t, you’ll be prompted to create one. [6] X Research source
